mapper.sql: DATASOURCE_ID, DATASOURCE_NAME, DATABASE_TYPE, CONNPOOL_TYPE, DATASOURCE_URL, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, INITIAL_SIZE, MAX_ACTIVE, MAX_WAIT, MAX_IDLE, REMOVE_STATUS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_DT, DATASOURCE_CHINESE_NAME
mapper.select: select a.DATASOURCE_ID, a.DATASOURCE_NAME, a.DATABASE_TYPE, a.CONNPOOL_TYPE, a.DATASOURCE_URL, a.USER_NAME, a.PASSWORD, a.INITIAL_SIZE, a.MAX_ACTIVE, a.MAX_WAIT, a.MAX_IDLE, a.REMOVE_STATUS, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_DT, a.UPDATED_BY, a.UPDATED_DT, a.DATASOURCE_CHINESE_NAME from rpt_datasource a left join rpt_data_Table b on a.DATASOURCE_ID = b.DATASOURCE_ID where table_id = #{tableId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into rpt_datasource (DATASOURCE_ID, DATASOURCE_NAME, DATABASE_TYPE, CONNPOOL_TYPE, DATASOURCE_URL, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, INITIAL_SIZE, MAX_ACTIVE, MAX_WAIT, MAX_IDLE, REMOVE_STATUS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_DT,DATASOURCE_CHINESE_NAME) values (#{datasourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{datasourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{databaseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{connpoolType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datasourceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{initialSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxActive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxWait,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxIdle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{removeStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{datasourceChineseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into rpt_datasource
DATASOURCE_ID,
DATASOURCE_NAME,
DATABASE_TYPE,
CONNPOOL_TYPE,
DATASOURCE_URL,
USER_NAME,
PASSWORD,
INITIAL_SIZE,
MAX_ACTIVE,
MAX_WAIT,
MAX_IDLE,
REMOVE_STATUS,
CREATED_BY,
CREATED_DT,
UPDATED_BY,
UPDATED_DT,
DATASOURCE_CHINESE_NAME,
#{datasourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{datasourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{databaseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{connpoolType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{datasourceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{initialSize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{maxActive,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{maxWait,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{maxIdle,jdbcType=INTEGER},

#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{datasourceChineseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update rpt_datasource
DATASOURCE_NAME = #{datasourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATABASE_TYPE = #{databaseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONNPOOL_TYPE = #{connpoolType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATASOURCE_URL = #{datasourceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INITIAL_SIZE = #{initialSize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MAX_ACTIVE = #{maxActive,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MAX_WAIT = #{maxWait,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MAX_IDLE = #{maxIdle,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REMOVE_STATUS = #{removeStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_DT = #{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_DT = #{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DATASOURCE_CHINESE_NAME = #{datasourceChineseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where DATASOURCE_ID = #{datasourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update rpt_datasource set DATASOURCE_NAME = #{datasourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATABASE_TYPE = #{databaseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONNPOOL_TYPE = #{connpoolType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATASOURCE_URL = #{datasourceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INITIAL_SIZE = #{initialSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MAX_ACTIVE = #{maxActive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MAX_WAIT = #{maxWait,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MAX_IDLE = #{maxIdle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REMOVE_STATUS = #{removeStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_DT = #{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_DT = #{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DATASOURCE_CHINESE_NAME = #{datasourceChineseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where DATASOURCE_ID = #{datasourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from rpt_datasource
order by DATASOURCE_ID desc

select
from `rpt_datasource` where REMOVE_STATUS = 0 order by DATASOURCE_ID desc
